idea-plugin.name: Handler-Navigator
idea-plugin.description:
Handler-navigator is a plugin that helps you to navigate between handler methods and their usages.

It provides a gutter icon that allows you to navigate to the handler method from the usage and vice versa.

It also provides a popup that shows the usages of the handler method.

It supports Spring MVC, Spring WebFlux, and JAX-RS annotations.

It also supports the following handler methods:

  • Controller methods
  • Request mapping methods
  • Handler methods
  • Router functions

It also supports the following handler method arguments:

  • Request parameters
  • Path variables
  • Request bodies
  • Request headers
  • Request parts
  • Request attributes
  • Session attributes
  • Model attributes
  • Principal
  • Authentication
  • Locale
  • TimeZone
